title: What should I know before starting a band? - Quora

response.answer_text: Someone needs to be the leader. That person needs to figure out when to rehearse, book gigs, and what music to focus on. Are you a cover band? Originals? Both? Everyone needs to understand what the goal is so you can work together. If you don't own PA gear you should designate members to be responsible for parts. One gets mics, one gets a mixer etc. Remember to have fun! If you are smiling and look like you are enjoying yourself the audience will too.
